page.title: 15Trade in Cliffe
page.content: In York Road, Cliffe, there is a firm called Hydraulic and Fluid Control, which supplies hydraulic hoses and fittings, drainage pipes, and some farm machinery. Near the playing field in the old maltings building, there is Megsons Motor Engineers, and also a firm of giftware importers. Four firms use the old railway land on Cliffe Common. The Brandsby Agricultural Trading Association, a farmers' co-operative, Stuart and Burton, who build steel framed buildings, Yorkshire Concrete Finishers who work on bridges and motorways, and Collins coaches, used for private hire. There are two coal merchants in Cliffe,and two families breed dogs, one Cocker Spaniels, the other German Shepherds and Samoyeds.
